event.title: was platted by European Americans in 1900

data.event: Arlington was platted by European Americans in 1900, and was named after Lord Henry Arlington, a member of Charles II of England's cabinet.

event.title: was incorporated as a city in May 5, 1903

data.event: When Arlington was incorporated as a city in May 5, 1903, it included Haller City.

event.title: were abandoned by NP's successor Burlington Northern in the 1980s

data.event: Both of these lines were abandoned by NP's successor Burlington Northern in the 1980s due to declining industry.
